neighbourhoodTypes.name: Quiet and Calm
neighbourhoodTypes.description: Ideal neighborhood type for those who want to relax and live a peaceful life.

neighbourhoodTypes.name: Vibrant and Active
neighbourhoodTypes.description: Energetic neighborhood type designed for those who love social interaction and city life.

neighbourhoodTypes.name: Artistic and Cultural
neighbourhoodTypes.description: Neighborhood type tailored for those interested in art and cultural activities.

neighbourhoodTypes.name: Green and Nature-Focused
neighbourhoodTypes.description: Perfect for nature enthusiasts, offering a green and eco-friendly environment.

activities.name: Cafes and Restaurants
activities.description: A variety of dining options including cafes and restaurants for socializing and enjoying meals.

activities.name: Sports and Exercise
activities.description: Facilities and areas dedicated to sports and exercise activities for a healthy lifestyle.

activities.name: Art and Cultural Events
activities.description: Engaging in artistic and cultural events to stimulate creativity and appreciation.

activities.name: Shopping and Markets
activities.description: Access to shopping centers and local markets for convenient and enjoyable shopping experiences.

communityAndEvents.name: Neighbourhood Picnics
communityAndEvents.description: Organizing communal picnics to strengthen community bonds and create memorable moments.

communityAndEvents.name: Yoga Classes
communityAndEvents.description: Providing yoga classes for residents to maintain physical and mental well-being.

communityAndEvents.name: Community Garden
communityAndEvents.description: Establishing a shared garden where residents can participate in gardening and foster a sense of community.

communityAndEvents.name: Book Club Meetings
communityAndEvents.description: Hosting book club gatherings to encourage reading and intellectual discussions within the neighbourhood.

localServices.name: Local Library
localServices.description: Access to a nearby library for residents to borrow books and engage in learning activities.

localServices.name: Health Center
localServices.description: Availability of a health center providing basic medical services for the well-being of residents.

localServices.name: Post Office
localServices.description: Convenient access to a local post office for mailing and receiving packages.

localServices.name: Public Transportation Stops
localServices.description: Proximity to public transportation stops to facilitate easy commuting for residents.

securityAndConvenience.name: Safe and Friendly
securityAndConvenience.description: A secure and welcoming environment where residents feel safe and connected with their neighbours.

securityAndConvenience.name: Peaceful and Family-Focused
securityAndConvenience.description: A tranquil neighbourhood with a focus on family-friendly amenities and activities.

securityAndConvenience.name: Fast Access and Transportation
securityAndConvenience.description: Efficient transportation options and quick access to essential services for convenience.

securityAndConvenience.name: Walking Paths and Parks
securityAndConvenience.description: Well-designed walking paths and nearby parks for residents to enjoy outdoor activities and nature.

cultureAndHistory.name: Historical Sites
cultureAndHistory.description: Preservation of historical sites within the neighbourhood, offering a glimpse into the area's past.

cultureAndHistory.name: Local Festivals and Events
cultureAndHistory.description: Celebration of local festivals and events, fostering a sense of community and shared traditions.

cultureAndHistory.name: Neighbourhood Story and Traditions
cultureAndHistory.description: Sharing the history and traditions of the neighbourhood, creating a strong sense of identity and belonging.
